page.title: 02BRECHIN PAGEANT DAY 1985.
page.content:
BRECHIN & DISTRICT ROUND TABLE
{PAGEANT DAY ON{SATURDAY,1st JUNE, 1985 in the{PUBLIC PARK from 2.00 p.m. Craft Fair, Police Dog Demonstration Highland Dancing,It's A Knockout, Side Shows,Trade Stands,Judo Club Demonstration,Tayside Police Pipe Band,Brass Band, Decorated Floats, People Race. (Race entries in advance from Brechin Books or on Field at 2.15p.m.).
Please Note: The Decorated Float Competition is sponsored by THE BANK OF SCOTLAND not the Royal Bank as stated in circular.
